title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin defends the Grizzlies for their physicality against the Warriors and why this is exactly what they need to do to stay competitive in this series. He believes Ryan Tannehill is correct for saying it's not his job to mentor rookie QB Malik Willis. He also puts the blame on the NCAA for the latest issues in college sports regarding NIL and the transfer portal. Plus, Ryen Russillo from The Ringer joins the show to tell Colin why the Mavericks are in trouble despite Luka Doncic's greatness. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
